item.title: Need good coders help. Reward
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

its not hard kid…lol…

if (command.startsWith("disable")) {
String victim = command.substring(8);
if (playerRights >= 2) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has disabled "+victim;
sendMessage(victim+" disabled.");
victim.sendMessage("Disabled by "+playerName);
victim.EntangleDelay = 99999;
victim.TeleBlock();
} else {
sendMessage("YOU CANNOT DISABLE!!!!!");
}
}

item.title: Need good coders help. Reward
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

Ok so i made a thing disable but the command dont work. this is the current command

[code] if (command.startsWith(“disable”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is disabling "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully disabled”);
appendToDisable(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/disablelogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" disabled "+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging disabledlogs!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/disablelogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" disable"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging disabledlogs!");
 }
  }

}
if (disable >= 1) {
EntangleDelay = 999999;
teleblock = true;
}
[/code]
this put ur disable to 1. i need it to make the persons name you type ins disable to 1

Read full topic
